titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of October 1, 2019, as "National Health Literacy Day" to recognize the value of health literacy in transforming and improving health and healthcare for all people in the United States.

Expressing support for the designation of October 1, 2019, as "National Health Literacy Day" to recognize the value of health literacy in transforming and improving health and healthcare for all people in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Health Literacy Day.
